rows.label: tlk41300022_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Hey, it's you. Are you
joining the self-defense
corps? ...Haha, just kidding.

rows.label: tlk41300022_04_msg0001
rows.name:
I hear it was Iira's doing again...
I wish they'd give it a rest.

rows.label: tlk41300022_04_msg0002
rows.name:
We were attacked before,
right? Everyone's anxious...
It's a real nuisance.

rows.label: tlk41300022_04_msg0003
rows.name:
We've increased the number of guards
in the self-defense corps just in
case, but we can't handle Iira.

rows.label: tlk41300022_04_msg0004
rows.name:
We'll prioritize evacuation and
manage somehow. *sigh*... Just
thinking about it is tiring.
